goal.ch:
了解水循環
了解降雨-逕流過程
練習水文模擬的基本技能
goal.en:
1.understand the water cycle 
2.understand the process of rainfall-runoff 
3.practice the basic skill of hydrologic simulation

outline.ch:
本課程將從地球系統的角度提供對水循環的基本理解，然後介紹降雨-逕流生成及其建模概念。
接著，在第5至第10週，學生將展示他們的研究並報告與其論文高度相關的關鍵文獻。
最後（第11至第16週），課程將聚焦於學生研究工作的進展。
outline.en:
In this class, we would provide a fundamental understanding of water cycle from the earth system perspective.
Then, introduce the rainfall-runoff generation and the concepts of rainfall-runoff modeling.
Secondly (week 5-10), the students will present their studies and report some key papers highly relevant with their thesis.
The final (week 11-16) will focus on the progresses of the students’ work.

觀測模擬及分析推理能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力
電腦及程式語言應用能力

en.competencies: Advanced mathematical and professional knowledge and ability
Observation simulation and analysis of reasoning ability
International perspective and language communication skills
